content: I'm having some issues with my showerhead, the water pressure isn't as strong as it used to be. I've been meaning to replace it, but I'm not sure what kind of showerhead I should get. Can you help me with that? By the way, I was just cleaning the grout between the tiles on my bathroom floor last weekend and it was a big job, took me about an hour with a toothbrush and baking soda.
